gist.headline: Fresh Ink
gist.blurb: The daily news has been printed and delivered to the front page.
gist.summary: Automated update to the README.md latest news section.
gist.impact: Ensures the repository landing page reflects the most recent project updates.
gist.visual_concept: The bee mascot reading a freshly printed newspaper with a robot. Represents the documentation update.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the bee mascot reading a newspaper held by a small robot. Lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Pixel text: 'NEWS'. Nostalgic and calm.
